page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In most of the households surveyed two people worked. The marjority of these worked in Norwich rather than in the surrounding villages. Out of fifteen workers most of them had worked for more than ten years at the same job. The average worker worked for forty hours a week. More people were public sector workers,than anything else.Most of the people we asked worked full time, rather than part time. We worked out that the average income of a weekly full time worker was between fifty and one hundred pounds. Of the houses we surveyed ,most people were in full time employment.
